title: Cancel Basic Authentication
preconditions: The user is on the "Basic Auth" page of the "The Internet" website.
The header of the page contains the message "This site is asking you to sign in."
main_flow: The user clicks the "Cancel" button on the "Basic Auth" page.
The browser page is redirected to a new page with the text "Not authorized".
postconditions: The user is redirected to a new page with the text "Not authorized".
The browser page does not contain the original "Basic Auth" page anymore.
Note: This use case is focused on the "Cancel" button and its effects on the page. It does not cover the entire login process or any other possible scenarios.
